name: granny stitch hat
sizes_available: premature (0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, 12-24 months, 3-10 years) teen/small adult (medium adult, large adult)
notes:
if you’re looking for a quick and easy beanie for the whole family then this crochet granny hat pattern is the one for you! with a simple ‘bottom up’ construction you can adjust the height and fit easily. in 9 sizes from premature baby through to large adult, you can make this classic and simple hat for everyone!

**what's included:**	
a 13-page pdf including written pattern in us terms, stitch tutorial, yarn alternatives, stitch chart, schematic and customisation information.

pattern support if you need or would like it.

difficulty is easy.

full video tutorial.

**materials and tools:**
hook:	4mm (g) [crochet hook][1] or size needed to meet gauge. 

yarn shown in: [color theory by lion brand][2] 100% acrylic, 246yds/225m﻿/100g

sizing: 
child granny hat sizes: premature (0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, 12-24 months, 3-10 years)
adult granny hat sizes: teen/small adult (medium adult, large adult)

to fit up to: 13 (14, 15, 16, 18, 20, 21, 22, 23) inches head circumference.

yarn quantities: 
each hat requires approximately 75 (100, 125, 150, 175, 225, 275, 320, 370) yds / 68 (90, 112, 135, 158, 203, 248, 293, 338)m of yarn.

gauge: 
band gauge: 20 sts and 17 rows = 4” x 4"
main hat body: 20 sts and 9 rounds of dc = 4” x 4”

please feel free to send me a message if you have any questions about the pattern as i am more than happy to help you out!

you are welcome to use this pattern for personal use to make and sell your finished items on a small scale. credit to hanjan crochet would be appreciated!

i'd love you to join me at www.hanjancrochet.com and share my free patterns and tutorials with you!
